title: Nvidia working on new AI chip for China
description: Nvidia is developing a new artificial intelligence chip for China based on its latest Blackwell architecture that will be more powerful than the H20 model it is currently allowed to sell there, two people briefed on the matter said.
content: BEIJING/SINGAPORE — Nvidia is developing a new artificial intelligence chip for China based on its latest Blackwell architecture that will be more powerful than the H20 model it is currently allowed to sell there, two people briefed on the matter sai... [4798 chars]

title: Canadian universities adopt AI tools amid technology concerns
description: Canadian universities are embracing generative artificial intelligence in their teaching plans as more students and instructors opt to use the rapidly evolving technology.
content:
Canadian universities are embracing generative artificial intelligence in their teaching plans as more students and instructors opt to use the rapidly evolving technology.

title: Bowman Says ‘Change Is Coming’ to How Fed Views AI and Crypto
description: Banks and regulators must embrace the benefits of new technologies such as artificial intelligence and crypto or risk diminishing their role in the economy, said US Federal Reserve Governor Michelle Bowman.
content:
Banks and regulators must embrace the benefits of new technologies such as artificial intelligence and crypto or risk diminishing their role in the economy, said US Federal Reserve Governor Michelle Bowman .
